keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.OIGA

Class Oiga

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.OIGA.Oiga

  • public class Oiga
extends java.lang.Object

    This class implements the OIGA algorithm from:

    Zhu, F., Guan, S.-U. Ordered incremental training with genetic algorithms. International Journal of Intelligent Systems 19 (12), pp. 1239-1256

    Since:
    JDK 1.5

    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Written by Julián Luengo Martín 08/02/2007

      • IGA

        public void IGA(SEM sem)
        Applies the Incremental Genetic Algorithm strategy. It adds the actual attribute to the present ones, incrementing the rules' antecedents.
        Parameters:
        sem - the SEM model evolved for the actual attribute

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the OIGA algorithm, with first creates and evolve a single SEM for each attribute. The next step comprises the selection of a attribute order for integration in an incremental way. For each attribte, we use the SEM evolved for it, and integrate its 1 attribute rules in the OIGA ones, using the IGA approach. Each integration implies an GA execution for adapting the rules.

      • printRules

        protected void printRules()

        Print the current rules to the file specified by KEEL .
